articles.title: Gionee Max Pro With 6,000mAh Battery, 6.52-Inch Display Launched in India: Price, Specifications - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Gionee Max Pro has been launched in India at a price of Rs. 6,999. It features a 6,000mAh battery, dual rear camera setup, and a 6.52-inch display. The phone is powered by Unisoc 9863A SoC, which is paired with 3GB of RAM.
articles.content: Gionee Max Pro was launched in India on Monday, expanding the Chinese technology company's entry-level smartphone offerings in the country. Resonating with the company's honest price approach, the ha… [+1922 chars]
